name: Space Jump (Vantack)
description:
Hi there! Space Jump is a new project I've been working on for 2-3 months.

In Space Jump you jump around from planet to planet, overcoming planet-platforming challenges, fighting enemies and solving puzzles.

the game is in a very early stage but already has a lot of its core mechanics built in.

I would very much appreciate any comments and feedback!

The game will eventually become a metroidvenia in which you discover a map and acquire new abilities (in the form of space movement maneuvers, guns and items) to progress.

Have fun playing!

controls:

  • A and D for walking around planets
  • W to jump between planets
  • E to interact with the world and pick up items
  • Aim with the Mouse and shoot with LMB
